I can run a dedicated server that anyone can join if enough people want.

You guys this is very easy to install.  All you have to do is download this and run the  exe.  Nothing else!  Of course u wont be able to play online since you wont have a real serial code so google gameranger and download that program.  With that program you can play online without a valid serial.

Once you  have everything fix and you are onn gameranger whne you host becareful on the maps you chooose.  If you host original maps then anybody can join but if you are hosting moded maps then only people with the mods can join, and not many have them yet.  Hence look at the version unofficial patch v1.3.   

Also i notice when you are trying to join games on game ranger you might have to try at least THREE times.  Sometimes it glitches and sends you back to main menu or game spy which we dont have.  So if that happens cancel and go back to the game ranger screen and click rejoin.  I have playing these game since game ranger has it and its been fun =]  Tell your friends!

New updated version:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6680924

For all those that have cd problems: This game is mainly to be use for multiplayer on game ranger.  if you are trying to start solo then you might have to download a crack or something else.

For those that host:  So for those who host i notice kashyyk, bespin platforms, and the naboo prototype map glitches.  What i mean by glitches is when we are playing it just kicks us out and usually few people stay on.  

For those who are first time playing on game ranger:  To those who just recently downloaded make sure your routers/firewall lets the game go through.  Once that is done and are trying to join a game make sure you see lan on the top left when you are trying to join.
If you do see LAN on top left then it should join automatically.  Sometimes it takes you to the main menu or game spy.  If that happens cancel go to multiplayer and click LAN.  You should be able to see it :)
Have fun!

to fix any pls insert disk errors here is the solution
1.go to gamecopyworld.com
2.look for star wars battlefront 2
3.find NoCD Patch
4.download
5.go to your Star Wars Battlefront 2 folder and paste the .exe there then there will be no more insert disk errors :)

If you or any other person could please explain how to get this feature working, it would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance.
